text: Keith Thomson (26 February 1941, Methven â€“ 26 January 2023, Christchurch) was a New Zealand cricketer and hockey player who played in the 1968 Olympics in Mexico City. He played two tests in cricket and 28 tests in hockey. ==Other websites== * * Category:1941 births Category:2023 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:New Zealand hockey players
